item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:1, topic:264527”][quote author=Server-Unknown.Net link=topic=348860.msg2684757#msg2684757 date=1235600147]
Thanks, and I found the real problems lol…

BEFORE

a{
color #006699;
text-decoration: none;
}

AFTER

a{
color[size=12pt]:[/size] #006699;
text-decoration: none;
}

And the footer wasnt within the #DIVcontainer so I had to place it there.
[/quote]

Oh, lmao. I didn’t even see that :P.[/quote]

me neither lol! Notepad++ is beter then notepad rofl… Easier to manage your codes =] cuz it highlights and draws line on the padding =].[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2009, 07:14:49 pm[/size][hr]Thread updated!

Read full topic

item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

Thanks, and I found the real problems lol…

BEFORE

a{ color #006699; text-decoration: none; }

AFTER

a{ color[size=12pt][b]:[/b][/size] #006699; text-decoration: none; }

And the footer wasnt within the #DIVcontainer so I had to place it there.

Read full topic
